sys_script.name: Registro de atores

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_272cb66f478e021025e7b4b4116d439c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1300284_raposa_0_ator</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Registro de atores</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var arrayAtor = current.ator;

    if (!arrayAtor) {
        return;
    }

    var ator = arrayAtor.split(',');

    for (var i = 0; i < ator.length; i++) {
        var item = ator[i].trim();

        var existingRecord = new GlideRecord('x_1300284_raposa_0_ator');
        existingRecord.addQuery('ator', item);
        existingRecord.query();

        if (!existingRecord.next()) {
            var newRecord = new GlideRecord('x_1300284_raposa_0_ator');
            newRecord.initialize();
            newRecord.ator = item;
            newRecord.insert();
        }
    }
    current.setAbortAction(true);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-15 01:31:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>272cb66f478e021025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Registro de atores</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_272cb66f478e021025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-21 11:25:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=272cb66f478e021025e7b4b4116d439c"/></record_update>
